channel.title: Battlefield Bad Company 2 - PS3 online lag issues
channel.description:
Anyone else got this game for PS3 and finding that on 9 games out of 10 there will be a bit of lag? Causes bullets to not respond, standing/crouching being jumpy, occasionally teleporting and a general delay in every action.
It's starting to really piss me off and am not sure whether it is a problem on my end, or whether the hosts and servers are shit? I've been on the officialy forum, and loads of people have been saying how bad the lag has been since the servers were updated....anyone else?
If not, anyone got any suggestions to decrease lag for this game? Any ports that I should open up or other settings I should change in my router.
